comp3111.data.model

Class Offering

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.data.model.Offering

  • @Entity
public class Offering
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an offering entity in the database. One tour may have multiple offerings. Offerings can be limited or repeating, depending on their constraints: Tour.getAllowedDaysOfWeek() and Tour.getAllowedDates().

    • Constructor Detail

      • Offering

        public Offering()

      • Offering

        public Offering(Tour tour,
                TourGuide tourGuide,
                java.util.Date startDate,
                java.lang.String hotelName,
                int minCustomers,
                int maxCustomers,
                java.lang.String status)
        Construct a transient offering object.
        Parameters:
        tour - The parent tour
        tourGuide - The tour guide who will lead this tour
        startDate - The start date of the offering
        hotelName - The hotel name
        minCustomers - The minimum number of customers required for this offering to be considered as STATUS_CONFIRMED
        maxCustomers - The maximum number of spots available for this offering
        status - The status of this offering. Can be STATUS_CONFIRMED (reached minCustomers at t=-3 days before start), STATUS_CANCELLED (underfull at t=-3 days before start, or manually cancelled), or STATUS_PENDING (by default)

      • getLastEditableDate

        public java.util.Date getLastEditableDate()
        Returns:
        the last date on which the offering may be edited. When we reach t=-3 days before offering start, the offering may no longer be edited (since it will have been confirmed or cancelled).
